channel.title: Summoning BOB dupe [PI]
channel.description:
There's a dupe with summoning beasts of burdens (pak yaks etc), that's similar to the save drop dupe. 1) You put the items in your pak yak 2) Relog to save them 3) Dismiss your yak to drop the items 4) Xlog 5) Log back in and your items are on the ground and your yak is back with all of your items.
Also, admins can spawn items and use beasts of burdens to transfer the items to other accounts. I trust my admins but i have no way of telling if they do or not. Where would i add a restriction for admins using certain summoning monsters. Or prevent admins from spawning certain pouches?

item.title: Summoning BOB dupe [PI]
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

Thank you, i resolved it. SaveGame when you click the dismiss button and SaveGame when you close the client or log out.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning BOB dupe [PI]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“loganownsyou, post:3, topic:540202”]How would re-writing the system fix the dupe? Don’t I need to add a savegame after the dismiss button is clicked?[/quote]Your system appears to be flawed, I can’t give you specific help without wanting to read through it all so I’m kindly suggesting that you re-write it all. Otherwise you can try to pin-point it yourself. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.description:

How would re-writing the system fix the dupe? Don’t I need to add a savegame after the dismiss button is clicked?

item.title: Summoning BOB dupe [PI]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

As for your dupe I would suggest re-writing your system. As for preventing admins from using certain items just add a simple if-else check in the item action 1 packet processing.

if (p.rights != 2) { // do spawning... }

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning BOB dupe [PI]
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

There’s a dupe with summoning beasts of burdens (pak yaks etc), that’s similar to the save drop dupe.

  1. You put the items in your pak yak
  2. Relog to save them
  3. Dismiss your yak to drop the items
  4. Xlog
  5. Log back in and your items are on the ground and your yak is back with all of your items.

Also, admins can spawn items and use beasts of burdens to transfer the items to other accounts. I trust my admins but i have no way of telling if they do or not. Where would i add a restriction for admins using certain summoning monsters. Or prevent admins from spawning certain pouches?

Read full topic
